    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Internal energy change of a gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interne Energieänderung eines Gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changement interne d'énergie d'un gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança interna da energia de um gás</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento interno di energia di un gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εσωτερική ενεργειακή αλλαγή του α αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambio interno de la energía de un gas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that the internal energy of a gas is increased by heating (a) and compressing it (b).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">internal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die interne Energie 
eines Gases durch Heizung (a) und das Komprimieren sie (b) erhöht 
wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que l'énergie 
interne d'un gaz est augmentée le chauffage (a) et en le comprimant 
(b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que a energia interna 
de um gás está aumentada o heating (a) e o comprimir (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che l'energia 
interna di un gas è aumentata il heating (a) e comprimendolo (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι η εσωτερική 
ενέργεια του α αέριο αυξάνεται με τη θέρμανση (α) και τη 
συμπίεση του (β).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que la energía 
interna de un gas es aumentada la calefacción (a) y comprimiéndola 
(b).</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Komprimierung</string>
          </keyword>
